overview: BEAR TRAP is a New Release Feature from Catalina's Furry Features Series of videos. If you like your men hot and hairy, you're likely to trip on this BEAR TRAP.  Director Brad Austin presents a good story that has Wade Garrett fretting over his "ex" returning to town. Wade doesn't want Al Johnson (who happens to be returning after a few years in prison) back in his life. So, Wade launches a plan to deal with Al, his convicted-felon-ex.
title: Bear Trap
